entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
